page.title: 02BIOGRAPHY - CHELWOOD GATE
page.content: {Rt. Hon. The Earl of Stockton O.M. Born 10.2.1894 Maurice Harold{Mac- {millan.}Soldier; scholar; publisher, politician. Hereditary earldom 10.2. 1984. 1916 injured World War 1. ADC to Governor General of Canada 1919. Mar- ried 21.4.20 Lady Dorothy Cavendish. Entered family publishing firm; in- creasingly concerned politics. Four children: Maurice (dec.) Carol, Cathe- rine, Sarah (dec.). 1926 Birch Grove House rebuilt. Conservative M.P. Stockton 1924, interests social reform, industrial reorganisation. M.P. Bromley 1945. Prime Minister 1957-63. US President Kennedy short visit Birch Grove 29.6.63. Kennedy Memorial Clump of trees in Ashdown Forest. Wrote memoirs in retirement. Wife died 1966. Received order of merit 1976. Chairman Macmillan Pub- (continues on page 3)
